items.title: Install the Appliance
items.description: Cisco Digital Network Architecture Center Appliance Installation Guide discusses workflow, inspection, warnings, rack requirements and LED.

items.title: Configure the Appliance
items.description: This guide discusses configuration workflow, browser access to CIMC, pre-flight checks, network interface card, bootable USB drive, reimage the appliance, ISO Image, master node, add-on nodes, and more.

items.title: Cisco DNA Center Appliance Setup
items.description: In this 3-minute video you will learn the basics of the DNA appliance including a description of the appliance. What the ports are used for along with tips for ordering.

items.title: Complete First-Time Setup
items.description: This guide provides information on first-time setup workflow, compatible browsers, first time login, Integration ISE With Cisco DNA Center, configure authentication, policy servers, configure SNMP properties and redistribute services.

items.title: New and Changed Information - Center
items.description: This guide summarizes the new and changed features for Cisco DNA Center and tells you where they are documented.

items.title: Get Started with Cisco IBN
items.description: Get Started with Cisco DNA Center provides information you need to get started including about Cisco DNA Center, log in, first time as a Network Administrator, default home page, use global search and where to start.

items.title: Introduction to Cisco DNA Center Interface
items.description: This 2-minute video introduces you to the Cisco DNA interface.

items.title: Enable Shared Services and External Connectivity
items.description: In this video you will work through a lab and configure connectivity to shared services.

items.title: Review the Appliance Features
items.description: This guide reviews appliance features. It includes a feature summary, describes front and rear panels, physical specifications, environmental specifications and power specifications.

items.title: Plan the Deployment
items.description: This guide provides information on DNA deployment it includes workflow, about Cisco DNA Center and Software-Defined Access and cable connections. It also discusses required subnets, additional IP addresses, SD-access ports and more.

items.title: New and Changed Assurance Info
items.description: This guide summarizes the new and changed features in the Cisco DNA Assurance User Guide, release 1.2.10 and tells you where they are documented.

items.title: Cisco DNA Assurance Overview
items.description: This guide talks about the benefits of Cisco DNA Assurance and provides information about analytics, log in, home page and how to get started with assurance.

items.title: Set Up Cisco DNA Center to Use Assurance
items.description: In this guide you will learn about how to set up Cisco DNA Center to use assurance. It includes setup workflow, discover devices, design network hierarchy, manage inventory, add a device to a site and more.

items.title: How to use Cisco DNA Center Appliance for Assurance and SD-Access
items.description: This 12-minute video gives an overview of the Cisco DNA Center Appliance hardware and an overview on initial setup. It also discusses Assurance configuration on Cisco DNA Center.

items.title: Cisco DNAC Supported Devices
items.description: This is an excel document that list supported devices and device information.

items.title: Cisco DNA Center Installation Prerequisites
items.description: This 12-min video will walk you through the steps required to install a DNA appliance.

items.title: Cisco ISE Integration Guide
items.description: Demonstrates the value of the Cisco DNA Center and Cisco® Identity Services Engine (ISE) integration

items.title: Wireless Assurance Guide
items.description: Demonstrates the value of the Wireless Assurance solution using a specific combination of equipment, OS version, and configuration.

items.title: Discover Your Network
items.description: Explains the Cisco DNA Center's 'Discovery' feature, which helps with inventory and device controllability.

items.title: How To Configure CLI and SNMP Credentials on Cisco DNA Center
items.description: Video explaining how to configure CLI and SNMP credentials on Cisco DNA Center.

items.title: Device Discovery Methods Using DNA Center
items.description: Video explaining CDP and IP address range methods of device discovery on Cisco DNA Center.

items.title: Device Discovery on Cisco DNA Center using CDP
items.description: Video showing how to discover your network devices on Cisco DNA Center using the Cisco Discovery Protocol.

items.title: Cisco DNA Center Device Discovery using IP Address Range
items.description: Video showing how to discover your network devices on Cisco DNA Center using the IP Address Range Method.

items.title: Manage Your Inventory
items.description: Explains how the 'Inventory' function retrieves and saves details, such as host IP addresses, MAC addresses, and network attachment points about devices in its database.

items.title: Introduction to Device Inventory Using Cisco DNA Center
items.description: Video showing how Cisco DNA Center makes Inventory management an effortless experience.

items.title: Key Device Inventory Tasks Using Cisco DNA Center
items.description: Video showing how to accomplish key tasks on your network using Cisco DNA Center Inventory tool.

items.title: Design Network Hierarchy and Settings
items.description: Explains how to create a network hierarchy within Cisco CNA Center that represents your network's geographical locations.

items.title: How To Create a Network Hierarchy on DNA Center
items.description: This video shows you how to export an existing network hierarchy from Cisco Prime Infrastructure and import it into Cisco DNA Center.

items.title: How to Import a Network Hierarchy in Cisco DNA Center
items.description: This video shows you how to export an existing network hierarchy from Cisco Prime Infrastructure and import it into Cisco DNA Center.

items.title: How To Add Devices to a Site
items.description: In this video you will learn how to add devices to a site using Cisco DNA Center. This task is necessary to add the device to an SD-Access fabric domain.

items.title: How To Create Server Settings Using Cisco DNA Center
items.description: This video wants you to know that. You can customize the server settings assigned to different segments within the organization hierarchy created using Cisco DNA Center.

items.title: How To Add IP Address Pools Manually On Cisco DNA Center
items.description: In this you video you will learn how to manually add IP address pools that enable you to create virtual networks in the SD-Access infrastructure using Cisco DNA Center.

items.title: How To Reserve and Manage IP Addresses Across Sites
items.description: In this video you will learn how to reserve and manage IP addresses in DNA Center. You can also use APIs to integrate with external IPAM tools.

items.title: Cisco Digital Network Architecture Center Upgrade Guide
items.description: This guide identifies Cisco DNA Center's upgrade prerequisites, paths, and procedures.

items.title: Release Notes for Cisco Digital Network Architecture Center
items.description: This guide identifies release-specific information for Cisco DNA Center, version 1.2.10

items.title: Cisco Digital Network Architecture Center Security Best Practices Guide
items.description: This guide explains best practices that must be followed to ensure a secure deployment.

items.title: Display Your Network Topology
items.description: Explains how to use the Topology feature within Cisco DNA Center, which creates a graphical view of your network.

items.title: Configure Telemetry Profile
items.description: Explains how to configure and apply profiles on devices for monitoring and assessing their health within Cisco DNA Center.

items.title: Provision Your Network
items.description: Explains how to use Cisco DNA Center to onboard devices and deploy the policies across them.

items.title: Monitor and Troubleshoot Overall Enterprise Health
items.description: Describes Cisco DNA Assurance's Enterprise Health feature, which helps monitor and troubleshoot the overall health of your enterprise.

items.title: Monitor and Troubleshoot Network Health
items.description: Describes how to use Cisco DNA Assurance to get a global view of your network and to determine if there are potential issues that must be addressed.

items.title: Monitor and Troubleshoot Client Health
items.description: Describes how to use Cisco DNA Assurance to get a global view of the health of all the wired and wireless client devices and to determine if there are potential issues that must be addressed.

items.title: Trace the Path of a Device
items.description: Describes how to use Cisco DNA Assurance to initiate a path trace between two nodes in your network—a specified source device and a specified destination device

items.title: Monitor Application Health
items.description: Explains how to use Cisco DNA Assurance's Application Experience (AX) feature, which allows you to monitor the health of an application.

items.title: Manage Sensors and Sensor-Driven Tests
items.description: Describes how to use Cisco DNA Assurance to test the health of the wireless network.

items.title: Integrate Cisco CMX for Wireless Maps
items.description: Explains how to use Cisco DNA Assurance to get the exact location of your clients on the floor map within Cisco DNA Center user interface.

items.title: Manage Intelligent Capture
items.description: Describes how to use Cisco DNA Assurance create a direct communication link between Cisco DNA Center and access points (APs), so each of the APs can communicate with Cisco DNA Center directly.

items.title: Manage Dashboards
items.description: Explains how to create dashboards in Cisco DNA Assurance to show charts, tables, geographic maps, and other types of network monitoring information.

items.title: Issues Detected by Assurance
items.description: Document which explains the issues that can be detected by assurance. These include global issues, client issues, switch and fabric issues, router issues, AP, wireless controller and sensor issues.

items.title: Schedule Reports
items.description: Document which explains how to sample and schedule reports for DNAC.

items.title: How to Add and Place Access Points on a Floor Map in Cisco DNA Center
items.description: Video explaining how to add, position, delete and place Access Points on a floor map in DNAC.

items.title: Creating an SSID for an Enterprise Wireless Network Using Cisco DNA Center
items.description: Video which demonstrates the process of creating an SSID and associating it with a wireless profile using DNAC.

items.title: Day 0 Provisioning of a Cisco Catalyst 9800 Series Wireless Controller Using Cisco DNA Center
items.description: Video which shows how to discover and provision a Cisco Catalyst 9800 Series Wireless Controller using DNAC.

items.title: How to Use Client 360 in Cisco DNA Center Assurance
items.description: Video which provides you an overview of how Client 360 in Cisco DNAC Assurance serves up detailed data about client devices on your network in a visually appealing and easy-to-analyze display.

items.title: How to Get Detailed Data with Application Health in Cisco DNA Center Assurance
items.description: Video which explains an overview of how Cisco DNAC Assurance monitors client application health.

items.title: How to Use Cisco Device 360 to Monitor WLCs and Access Points
items.description: Video which explains how Cisco Device 360  monitors Wireless LAN Controllers and Access Points in your network and provides detailed device insights.

items.title: How to Use Device 360 in Cisco DNA Center Assurance to Gather Data on Switches and Routers
items.description: Video  which shows how Device 360 gathers information for switches and routeres in DNAC.

items.title: How to Run a Path Trace in Cisco DNA Center Assurance
items.description: Video which explains how to learn how to set up and run a path trace to identify connectivity issues between two nodes on your network.

items.title: Cisco DNA Center Assurance Setup
items.description: Video which explains how to set up DNAC. This setup will cover how to discover devices, design network hierachy and provision telemetry setttings.

items.title: Cisco DNA Center Data Sheet
items.description: Overview Data Sheet for DNAC which is the foundational controller and analytics platform at the heart of Cisco’s intent-based networking.

items.title: Getting Started with Cisco DNA Assurance
items.description: Video on the overview of how DNAC assurance helps you monitor and fix issues anywhere in the network.

items.title: Wireless Assurance In-Depth
items.description: Video which explains wireless assurance in DNAC.

items.title: DNA Center Powers Up with Assurance
items.description: Video which explains how to turn raw data into actionable insights for routing, switching, and wireless in DNAC.

items.title: Troubleshoot the Deployment
items.description: Document which explains how to troubleshoot the installation of DNAC.

items.title: Troubleshoot Cisco DNA Center Using Data Platform
items.description: This document provides detailed steps to troubleshoot issues you may encounter during device onboarding using Cisco DNA Center release 1.2.x and PnP.

items.title: How To Change Log Severity in Cisco DNA Center
items.description: In this video you will learn how to change the log level for a service.

items.title: How To Check RADIUS Logs in ISE
items.description: In this video you will learn how to access RADIUS logs in Cisco ISE. View information about RADIUS authentication sessions, and troubleshoot authentication issues.

items.title: How To Enable Debugs in ISE
items.description: In this video you will learn how to change the log level for components in Cisco Identity Service Engine (ISE), the policy management tool in our Cisco DNA solution.

items.title: Cisco DNA ROI Calculator
items.description: This site shows you how to use the Cisco DNA ROI Calculator to see how much your organization could save with a software-defined network.

items.description: This document provides a checklist for your adoption journey.

items.title: Adoption Success Plan Checklist
items.description: This document provides a checklist for the execution of your adoption plan.

items.description: This guide will help you to manage users. It includes information about user profiles, roles, local users, changing your password and more.

items.description: This document will show you how to back-up and restore.

items.description: This document describes the procedures used to configure the system settings.

items.description: This document covers the requirements that need to be met to use HA, deployment and administration best practices, and the failure scenarios you may encounter.

items.description: This document describes how to perform application management.

items.description: This document describes how to manage users.

items.description: This document shows you how to back-up and restore.

items.description: This document goes over licensing Cisco DNA Center 1.3.
